footer.spa.title: Zenith Spa
footer.spa.content: With more than 10 years of experience working as well as teaching in the field of massage in Ho Chi Minh City. Coming to service Massage Da Nang with enthusiasm and a team of skilled technicians, we have been receiving a lot of satisfaction from many customers.We are committed to bringing real value to you.
footer.information.title: CONTACT INFORMATION
footer.information.address: 204 Võ Nguyên Giáp, Phước Mỹ, Sơn Trà, Đà Nẵng
contact.step2: Spa Confirm via email or phone number
contact.step3: Arrive at the spa with an appointment
contact.step4: Staff will advise on suitable service packages
contact.step5: Enjoy fruit, tea, medicinal foot bath
contact.step6: Choose massage scent and notes for the Technician
contact.step7: Change clothes and enjoy the comfortable feeling
contact.step8: Pay and give feedback after completion
